snippet: A look at a geometrically complex arcade canopy by Preston Scott Cohen, an effective use of public space in Lower Manhattan that connects the Goldman Sachs headquarters to a shopping arcade and hotel.
abstract: Michael Kimmelman reviews canopy structure designed by Preston Scott Cohen in New York City's Battery Park City.
lead_paragraph: A look at a geometrically complex arcade canopy by Preston Scott Cohen, an effective use of public space in Lower Manhattan that connects the Goldman Sachs headquarters to a shopping arcade and hotel.

headline.seo: Architectural Canopy Shines in Battery Park City
